commit message:
Merge pull request #13 from chrisinajar/disable-firmware-upgrades

Dont upgrade firmware within the app, instead link to the Ledger Wallet

Browserify source code and utilize npm

Set up basic build scripts with gulp

Fix asset scripts and get everything working with symlink directory

Make sure build doesnt show up even if its a symlink

Milestone 1: All application code is bundled into 1 js file

All angular requirements moved in to commonjs / npm

Completely refactored all of the library usages. App works, but complains about typeahead-popup when in send money

Got QR codes working again, restore all known previous functionality

Made QR codes at signup work again

Example of broken out service for maintainability and testability

Update build system to compile JS assets

revert auto-formatting that applied too bitcoin.min.js

Copy files from build, not static

Enable CSS compiling with gulp

Use requirements.txt for python deps

Remove scripts.generated.html and a stray debugger

Load signupcontroller without using injector.invoke

Example lint+test cased service
Fixed the transaction modal when rbf is disabled
Fixed date pickers in transaction list broken after Angular upgrades
Correctly set TRAVIS_NODE_VERSION and CXX vars
Removed the no longer required angular-node dependency
